name: The Skate Escape
description:
Play as a squirrel and skate your way to victory as you explore the city, rebuild ramps, and avoid vultures!

Our game was designed to be played using the Wii Fit Balance board using the Wii Balance Walker program. Lean to control! (Keyboard Controls available)
